title: B'wood lashes out at Shiv Sena's ban on Pak artists
text: B'wood lashes out at Shiv Sena's ban on Pak artists Saturday, 24 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) The Bollywood fraternity has come together to criticize the Shiv Sena for not allowing any Pakistan i actor, cricketer or artist to enter Maharashtra. STARS SUPPORT ARTISTS FROM PAK STANDS AGAINST SHIV SENA GRIPE 00:54 Since popular religious group Shiv Sena vowed not to allow any artists from neighbouring country Pakistan to perform in Maharashtraâ€™s soil, the entire Bollywood came forward in support of Pakistani artists and said art is something which flows beyond boundaries. Art and culture cannot be...
